---

## Acceleration3Able

```typescript
new Acceleration3Able(entity, 0, 0, 0)
entity.Acceleration3Able.acceleration = new Vector3(1, 1, 1)

```

## Friction3Able

```typescript
new Friction3Able(entity, 1)
entity.Friction3Able.friction = 1

```
